title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions:
1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook spaghetti until al dente.
2. In a bowl, beat the eggs and mix with grated Parmesan cheese.
3. In a skillet, cook pancetta until golden and crispy.
4. Drain the pasta and quickly toss with the pancetta and its fat.
5. Remove from heat and mix in the egg-cheese mixture vigorously to create a creamy sauce.
6. Season with black pepper and serve hot.

title: Pancakes
instructions:
1. In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
2. In another bowl, beat eggs and combine with milk, melted butter, and vanilla.
3. Combine wet and dry ingredients until a smooth batter forms.
4. Heat a non-stick pan and pour 1/4 cup of batter.
5. Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook the other side until golden.
6. Serve warm with butter, syrup, or fresh fruits.

title: Mango Smoothie
instructions:
1. Peel and chop ripe mangoes into chunks.
2. In a blender, add mango, yogurt, honey, and ice cubes.
3. Blend until smooth. Add milk if you want a thinner consistency.
4. Pour into chilled glasses and serve immediately.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions:
1. Butter one side of each bread slice.
2. Place cheese between two slices with buttered sides facing out.
3. Heat a skillet on medium heat and place the sandwich.
4. Grill until golden brown, then flip and cook the other side.
5. For extra flavor, sprinkle garlic powder on butter before grilling.

title: Caesar Salad
instructions:
1. Wash and chop the romaine lettuce.
2. Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and freshly grated Parmesan.
3. Squeeze some lemon juice on top and season with black pepper and garlic.
4. Serve immediately for a fresh, crunchy salad.

title: Chicken Alfredo
instructions:
1. Cook fettuccine pasta in salted boiling water according to package instructions.
2. While pasta cooks, heat olive oil in a pan and cook chicken breast until golden and cooked through. Remove and slice.
3. In the same pan, melt butter, add garlic, and cook until fragrant.
4. Pour in heavy cream and bring to a simmer. Stir in Parmesan cheese and season with salt and pepper.
5. Add the cooked pasta and chicken to the sauce, and toss everything together.
6. Serve hot, garnished with extra Parmesan.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a bowl, cream together butter, sugar, and brown sugar.
3. Add eggs and vanilla, and beat until smooth.
4. In another bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt, then mix into the wet ingredients.
5. Stir in chocolate chips.
6. Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes until golden.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions:
1. Chop all the vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
2. In a pan, heat sesame oil and sauté garlic and ginger until fragrant.
3. Add the vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until tender.
4. Pour in soy sauce and stir to coat.
5. Serve immediately with rice or noodles.
